name: companyUrl
label: Company URL
help: The LinkedIn company page URL to fetch

name: retrieveEmployees
label: Retrieve Employees
help: Whether to retrieve company employees information

name: employeeLimit
label: Employee Limit
help: Maximum number of employees to retrieve (max 500). Only used when Retrieve Employees is enabled

name: retrieveDMs
label: Retrieve Decision Makers
help: Whether to retrieve company decision makers information

name: dmsLimit
label: Decision Makers Limit
help: Number of decision makers to retrieve (max 20). Only used when Retrieve Decision Makers is enabled

name: retrievePosts
label: Retrieve Posts
help: Whether to retrieve company posts information

name: postsLimit
label: Posts Limit
help: Number of posts to retrieve (max 20). Only used when Retrieve Posts is enabled

name: postsSince
label: Posts Since
help: Retrieve posts published after this date. Only used when Retrieve Posts is enabled
